data.title: HanaVision Software Engineer Intern
data.desc: Worked on surveillance cameras and smart CCTVs. Building ML models to detect anomalies and implement it on surveillance systems. Using Python language I was mostly testing CNN models and creating algorithms to detect anomaly in surveillance videos.

data.title: Concentrix QA Intern
data.desc: Customer Web Application products, web page products quality assurance assisting. Such as requirements meet check, publication check.

data.title: enkorwithus Frontend Developer
data.desc: Worked on enkorwithus web products such as their B2C platform. While here I took care of the frontend development for the core platform which was written Typescript and powered by Next.js. enkorstay was another web platform we've created to help foreigners who were looking housing in South Korea. I was in charge of the frontend development. enkorwithus internal dashboard, enkorstay and host frontend and deployment.

data.title: Paula's Choice Frontend Developer
data.desc: Paulas Choice APAC Storefront SFCC(SalesForce Commerce Cloud) and React, Typescript based frontend product
